Code: EXEC SQL SELECT T1.COD_CONVENIO, T1.NUM_APOLICE, T1.NRENDOS, T1.COD_AGENCIA_DEB, T1.OPER_CONTA_DEB, T1.NUM_CONTA_DEB, T1.DIG_CONTA_DEB, T1.NUM_CARTAO FROM SEGUROS.V0MOVDEBCC_CEF WHERE T1.COD_AGENCIA_DEB = :COD_AGENCIA_DEB AND T1.OPER_CONTA_DEB = :OPER_CONTA_DEB AND T1.NUM_CONTA_DEB = :NUM_CONTA_DEB AND T1.NUM_APOLICE = T2.NUM_APOLICE AND T2.RAMO_EMISSOR IN (31,53,14,18,67,71) GROUP BY T1.COD_CONVENIO, T1.NUM_APOLICE, T1.NRENDOS, T1.COD_AGENCIA_DEB, T1.OPER_CONTA_DEB, T1.NUM_CONTA_DEB, T1.DIG_CONTA_DEB, T1.NUM_CARTAO END SQL
